title: Man's disastrous pizza topping is making people very uncomfortable
text:
Man's disastrous pizza topping is making people very uncomfortable This new type of pizza is unnerving a lot of people Share Comments By Joshua Barrie 09:42, 28 FEB 2017 Updated 10:52, 28 FEB 2017 News (Photo: Twitter / @FOX152) Share Comments Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email Until now, pineapple was probably the world's most divisive pizza topping. Not everyone appreciates the curious blend of tropical fruit with tomato and cheese.
But a perhaps progressive individual has taken the conversation up a notch. He's invented a new style of pizza, one that has, it is safe to say, caused agitation.
Twitter user @FOX152 shared a photo of his dish on Monday. On it, was classic ingredients such as tomato, cheese, and what might possibly be some sort of ham.
Read More Restaurant owner destroys moaning customer on TripAdvisor after 'lazy Thai' remarks But the man also added two other less traditional things – mayonnaise, and peas.
Mayonnaise, and peas.
Pretty much everyone who has so far encountered @FOX152's bizarre attempt at food has reacted in the same way – by vomiting everywhere, figuratively at least. Like a gap year student drinking a fishbowl of rum punch on a small, hot Thai island.
Quite sour The reactionary chunder gifs and emotional comments are still going on. But we'll leave it there for now.
But we do of course need to ask you what you think. Peas and mayonnaise on a pizza? Maybe we're all jumping the gun, and it's actually a work of culinary genius? Or maybe it's the absolute worst.
